subject: Says delivered, but I didn't receive
description_text:
Is there a number I can call?

I need some help

conversations.body_text: Hi Luiz Fernando Borges,  Sorry, we filled in the wrong logistics number, your package has been delivered, please check your front door. We apologize for the inconvenience! https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=882556886381&trkqual=12029~882556886381~FDEG Â
